title: reflect: Value.Swap(i, j) for slices?
body:
There appears to be no way to swap two values in a reflect.Value for a slice, other than
allocating a holder value, e.g.:

tmp := reflect.New(t).Elem()
tmp.Set(v.Index(i))
v.Index(i).Set(v.Index(j))
v.Index(j).Set(tmp)

Is it possible/would you be interested in introducing a v.Swap(i, j)?
